item.title: Lit: The references I will give if I organize a lecture on information seeking
item.description: Information seeking is an act when people find there is an interest or knowledge gap in one area and then to acquire new information.It’s a concept in information science but has gradually become important in communication studies, especially in scientific communication, health communication and other applied communication studies. Here I’m gonna give a list of references on information seeking when I wrote my research on the same topic . These references help me a lot while building the concepts and models in the study.
